mapper.insert: insert into chatroom (chatroom_no, admin_no, customer_no, updated_date) values (chatroom_no_seq.nextval chatroomNo, #{adminNo}, #{customerNo}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select chatroom_no chatroomNo, admin_no adminNo, customer_no customerNo, updated_date updatedDate
select chatroom_no chatroomNo, admin_no adminNo, customer_no customerNo, updated_date updatedDate from chatroom where customer_no = #{value};
